A

AbstractEvent - class robowars.AbstractEvent.
Base class for all event classes.
ahead(double) - Method in class robowars.Robot
sets the linear distance to be moved by the robot.

B

Bullet - class robowars.Bullet.
The Bullet class is instantiated when a robot fires.
BulletHitEvent - class robowars.BulletHitEvent.
Represents bullet hitting a robot.
BulletMissedEvent - class robowars.BulletMissedEvent.
Represents bullet missing a robot (hitting a wall).

C

constant used in the calculation of gun heat(0 units).

The class Constants defines a number of constants.

D

DeathEvent - class robowars.DeathEvent.
Represents the death of a robot.
DistanceCompleteEvent - class robowars.DistanceCompleteEvent.
Indicates the completion of linear motion set by the method ahead in the class Robot

E

execute() - Method in class robowars.Robot
this is the main method to be overriden by the user in his class.

F

fire(double) - Method in class robowars.Robot
Fire a bullet of the specified power.

G

H

HIT_BULLET_CONST_FACTOR - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
constant used in calculating health lost by a robot hit by a bullet or points scored by the hitting robot (1 unit).
HIT_BULLET_SCORE_BONUS - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
constant used in calculating the points scored by the firing robot, when its bullet hits an opponent (1.5).
HIT_BY_BULLET_HEALTH_PENALTY - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
constant used in calculating health lost by a robot hit by a bullet (1.5).
HIT_ROBOT_HEALTH_PENALTY - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
the health lost by the robot when hit by another robot (2 units).
HIT_ROBOT_SCORE_PENALTY - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
the score lost by the robot when hit by another robot (2 points).
HIT_WALL_HEALTH_PENALTY - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
the health lost by the robot on hitting a wall (1 unit).
HIT_WALL_SCORE_PENALTY - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
the score lost by the robot on hitting a wall (1 point).
HitByBulletEvent - class robowars.HitByBulletEvent.
Represents bullet hitting a robot.
HitRobotEvent - class robowars.HitRobotEvent.
Represents robot hitting a robot.
HitWallEvent - class robowars.HitWallEvent.
Represents robot hitting a wall The object of this class is passed to the event handler routine onHitWall The conventions regarding axes and angles are the same as in Robot.

I

INITIAL_HEALTH - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
initial value of health that a robot starts with in every round (200 units).
isOtherRobotStalled() - Method in class robowars.HitRobotEvent
tells if the other robot was stalled when hit A robot gets stalled on making insufficient calls to its update method
isStalled() - Method in class robowars.HitByBulletEvent
tells if the robot was stalled when it was hit A robot gets stalled on making insufficient calls to its update method
isStalled() - Method in class robowars.HitRobotEvent
tells if the robot was stalled when hit by the other robot.
isStalled() - Method in class robowars.HitWallEvent
tells if the robot was stalled when the event occured A robot gets stalled when it makes insufficient calls to its update method
isStalled() - Method in class robowars.RobotInformation
tells if the robot is stalled.

M

MAXVEL - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
the maximum velocity of the robot (3 units/game time).
MAX_ANGVEL - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
the Maximum angular velocity of the robot (Math.PI/80 radians/game time).
MAX_BULLET_VEL - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
the maximum bullet velocity (15 units/game time).
MAX_POWER - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
the maximum power of a bullet (3 units).
MIN_POWER - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
the minimum power of a bullet (1 unit).

O

onBulletHit(BulletHitEvent) - Method in class robowars.Robot
This event is generated when this robot's bullet hits an opponent
onBulletMissed(BulletMissedEvent) - Method in class robowars.Robot
This event is generated when this robots's bullet hits a wall
onDeath(DeathEvent) - Method in class robowars.Robot
this method is called when the robot dies.
onDistanceComplete(DistanceCompleteEvent) - Method in class robowars.Robot
this method is called when the robot's linear movement set by ahead is completed.
onGunTurnComplete(GunTurnCompleteEvent) - Method in class robowars.Robot
this method is called when the robot's gun movement set by turnGun is completed.
onHitByBullet(HitByBulletEvent) - Method in class robowars.Robot
This event is generated when the robot is hit by a bullet
onHitRobot(HitRobotEvent) - Method in class robowars.Robot
This event is generated when the robot collides with another robot.
onHitWall(HitWallEvent) - Method in class robowars.Robot
This event is generated when the robot hits a wall.
onTurnComplete(TurnCompleteEvent) - Method in class robowars.Robot
this method is called when the robot's angular movement set by turn is completed.
onWin(WinEvent) - Method in class robowars.Robot
this method is called when the robot wins a round.

P

POWER_CONST - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
constant used in the calculation of bullet velocity (4/3).

R

ROBOT_HEIGHT - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
the height of robot (30 units).
ROBOT_WIDTH - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
the width of robot (30 units).
ROUNDTIME - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
the maximum duration of a round in game time units (4500).
ROUND_WIN_BONUS - Static variable in class robowars.Constants
the bonus score that a robot earns for winning a round (25 points)
Robot - class robowars.Robot.
The Robot class serves as the base class for any user defined Robot.
Robot() - Constructor for class robowars.Robot
 
RobotInformation - class robowars.RobotInformation.
The class RoboInformation encapsulates useful information about a robot.
robowars - package robowars
 
run() - Method in class robowars.Robot
 

S

setAngularVelocity(double) - Method in class robowars.Robot
sets the magnitude of the angular velocity (in radians/game time) of the robot to angVel.
setVelocity(double) - Method in class robowars.Robot
sets the magnitude of linear velocity (in units/game time) of the robot to vel.

T

TurnCompleteEvent - class robowars.TurnCompleteEvent.
Indicates the completion of robot's angular motion set by the method turn in the class Robot
toString() - Method in class robowars.Robot
returns the name of the robot.
toString() - Method in class robowars.RobotInformation
returns the name of the robot.
turn(double) - Method in class robowars.Robot
sets the angular distance to be moved by the robot.
turnGun(double) - Method in class robowars.Robot
sets the angular distance to be moved by the robot's gun.

U

update() - Method in class robowars.Robot
the method update should be periodically called by the robot.

W

WinEvent - class robowars.WinEvent.
Represents robot winning a round.
